text: The Washington Stock Exchange, through its president or treasurer, shall pay to the Collector of Taxes of the District of Columbia a sum equal to $500 per annum in lieu of tax on the members thereof for business done on said exchange.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2504.

1973 Ed., § 47-1707.

Miscellaneous Notes

Office of Collector of Taxes abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-401.

DC CODE § 47-2504

Current through December 11, 2012
